koohiiStory1: You paint 10 huge eyes on your shield to scare the enemy, but consequently your shield is so big and heavy that you have to drag it.
koohiiStory2: From Wikipedia: "If a Spartan hoplite were to return to Sparta alive and without his shield, it was assumed that he threw his shield at the enemy in an effort to flee; an act punishable by death or banishment." However, the Spartan desperately clutches on, and is dragged around for a while, preferring to die than to lose his shield.

WaniKani_Reading_Info: This pope would have been in a lot of trouble if June's summer sun hadn't risen at just the right moment. His shield would have become useless and he might have been shoved off the cliff if it was a less sunny month.

humanum_full_description_en:
The shape of a square shield (Guo Moruo) with a golden inscription, the original meaning is a shield. In the later period, the inscriptions on the inscriptions were written in a " ten " shape. Bronze [冬戈] glyph with " Din " is the sound symbol, and the ancient sounds of " Din " and " Dun " are the same. "Shuowen": "Shields, slaps. So defend the body and cover the eyes, pictograms. All shields belong to the shield."

Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning of shields, [Dong Ge] Gui: "Captive soldiers shield, spear, Ge, bow." Against the clock: "Yi (given) female (ru) shield five." Also used as a clan name.

Radicals: 厂  (cliff, pope)
Meaning Mnemonic
On a cliff, the pope is holding a shield. The pope is near the edge of the cliff and is using the shield to fend off demons. The demons want to shove the pope off the cliff, but the pope is using his holy shield of popery to fend them off.
Imagine the shield glowing brightly as hymns play in the background. The demons try to get close to the pope to shove him off the cliff but the holy shield is too bright and popey.
Reading Mnemonic
The light of the pope's shield begins to fade. The shield's holy power is waning! Just as the demons are about to push him off the cliff, the sun begins to rise. That's right! It's June (じゅん) and summer has just begun. The pope's shield reflects the power of June's bright sun into the eyes of the demons, casting them off the cliff behind him and back into hell!
This pope would have been in a lot of trouble if June's summer sun hadn't risen at just the right moment. His shield would have become useless and he might have been shoved off the cliff if it was a less sunny month.
